sentence.Network_en: I liked children, loved their innocence and their inquisitiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我喜欢孩子，喜欢他们的天真与好奇。
这尤其引起了他们的好奇心.

sentence.Network_en: This attitude combines a lack of class consciousness, a somewhat jaunty optimism and an inquisitiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种态度包括等级观念不强, 得意洋洋的乐观劲儿和刨根问底的好奇心.

entry.tran: 爱打听的;好探问的;过于好奇的
entry.def: An inquisitive person likes finding out about things, especially secret things.

example.tran: 巴罗天生就爱打听别人隐私。

example.ex: Bears are very inquisitive and must be kept mentally stimulated.
example.tran: 熊非常好奇,必须不断地给予其智力上的刺激。

auth_sentence.content: Elsewhere Gismonti plays piano with a graceful yet playful inquisitiveness, as on the angular, muscular "Frevo".
